description: Identify processes spawned by user actions, especially from Office documents, PDFs, or web browsers that could lead to malicious execution. Analytic 1 - Processes created from user interaction with files. ((sourcetype=WinEventLog:Security EventCode=4688) OR (sourcetype=Sysmon EventCode=1)) | search parent_process IN ("winword.exe", "excel.exe", "chrome.exe", "firefox.exe") | stats count by parent_process process_name command_line user | where process_name NOT IN ("chrome.exe", "firefox.exe", "winword.exe", "excel.exe")
